name: Loophole (Sarrixx, Shadowaduro, Claith, TheOriginal201)
description:
Awoken from an ancient slumber, you are trapped in the archaic ancient hallways of a bygone era. But not all is as it seems, use the powers granted to you through the ethereal realm to see things as they really are. Unlock the lost secrets of this mysterious temple, and you may just find your eternal rest once more.

This game was made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.1, the theme of which was 'holes'.

Credits

This game was collaboratively created by the following people, listed alphabetically by surname.

Joshua Ferguson

[Programming, Design]

Mitchell Heath

[3D Art, Audio, Design]

Ashley Johnson

[2D Art, Design]

Jethro Richards

[3D Art, Programming, Design]

S (Backward)
A (Strafe Left)
D (Strafe Right) Left Analogue Stick Camera Movement Mouse Movement Right Analogue Stick Use E | Left Mouse Button □ Jump Space-bar X Crouch Left Control ⃝ Sprint Left Shift Left Thumbstick Button Pause Menu Escape Options Menu Selection R1 | R2
